meanings.definition: The time at which the sun rises in the morning.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, we wake up at sunups to see the sun rise.
meanings.sent2: I love watching the beautiful colors in the sky at sunups.
meanings.sent3: At sunups, the sleepy town slowly comes to life as people start their day.
meanings.sent4: The promise of a new beginning fills the air at sunups.
meanings.sent5: The birds chirp happily at sunups, welcoming the day.

meanings.definition: The act of rising or appearing above the horizon in the morning.
meanings.sent1: The sunups over the ocean are always breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The sunups mark the start of a new day full of possibilities.
meanings.sent3: The sunups peeking through the trees create a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The sunups bring warmth and light to the world.
meanings.sent5: The sunups paint the sky with vibrant hues, signaling a fresh start.
